name: Slime Slicer
description:
-------
"There's one enemy only, Steven... and we have it contained! Relax."

"John, listen to me... This thing is dangerous. It's molecular structure is beyond our understanding."

"We don't know that yet... We'll just extract some samples for testing. Stay calm!"
-------

Controls
Left Mouse Button = Drag and Slice
Right Mouse Button = Collect Slime
2 = Select Blade 2 (Slices Enemies in 2)
3 = Select Blade 3 (Slices Enemies in 3)
M = Mute
R = Reset Level

-------

Made for Trijam 125 - One Enemy Only

All assets made by Mallardbro.

I finally managed to squeeze* in random level generation! :)

*Yeah, I went over three hours - ssssshhhh!

-------

If I had more time...

  • Some nice slime effects on the ground
  • Some juicy "squelch" sound effects
  • Track the number of slices per level, allowing players to aim for optimal strategies.
